name: Vibes - positive soundscapes to boost your workday
name_original: Vibes - positive soundscapes to boost your workday
description:
Vibes software is an ambient noise generator for Windows that lets you create a personalized sound environment for relaxing or working. Cozy soundscapes and background sounds to boost your workday creativity by prompting abstract thinking.

  •  Sleep timer

  •  Offline use (no internet connection required)

  •  Lifetime license, no subscription

  •  System requirements: Windows PC, display 1000x700 or higher
